destinations.description: The rugged coast of Catalonia features some of Spain's finest golf courses, combining Mediterranean charm with challenging layouts. Home to the prestigious PGA Catalunya Resort.
destinations.best_season: March to June, September to November

destinations.description: Home to world-class golf courses set against the stunning backdrop of the Andes Mountains and Patagonian landscapes. The country offers a unique blend of European-style courses and natural beauty.
A tropical paradise with championship golf courses designed by legends like Ernie Els and Bernhard Langer. The courses offer spectacular ocean views and challenging play.
Features world-class golf courses set against the backdrop of the Italian Alps and beautiful lakes. The region combines golf with rich cultural experiences and fine dining.
Turkey's premier golf destination with multiple championship courses designed by golf legends. The area offers luxury resorts and courses along the Mediterranean coast.
destinations.best_season: March to June, September to November

destinations.description: Home to the Caribbean's finest golf courses, including the famous Teeth of the Dog. Features courses designed by Pete Dye, Jack Nicklaus, and Tom Fazio.
Offers diverse golf experiences from coastal courses to inland championship layouts. Home to the famous Gary Player Country Club and numerous other world-class courses.
